content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the following concepts related to energy
(A) Heat flow
(B) Kinetic energy 
(C) Potential energy
(D) First law of thermodynamics 
(E) Second law of thermodynamics
content.question: An energy transformation occurs and results in increased disorder.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
